page.title: 04A Day in my Life.
page.content:
Wednesday. (cont.) Then the fourth years go to Mr. Smith for scripture, then the juniors have singing , then go out to play. When we come in we work until 12 noon. I go into dinner with my friends and we sit together. I normally have cheese and pickle sandwiches, then jam sandwiches, then orange yoghurt, a penguin and an apple. After dinner we go outside and play until the bell goes at 1.15pm. We do maths or writing for the the afternoon. At 2.45pm we clear up for a story called "The Whispering Knights" by P.Lively. At 3.15pm we go home.
By Sarah Stephens, age 11
